The presence of green: colored flags at the rally, which were claimed to be Islamic or Pakistani flags.
Tweets and posts by: Padhalika and actress Koena Mitra alleging the presence of Islamic flags at the rally and linking it to potential partition and anti-India sentiments.
The clarification from experts stating t: colored flags seen at the rally were the flags of the Indian Union Muslim League (IUML) and not the Pakistani flag.
